OOC: Blah... I disappear for a couple months and no one remembers my most heavily used character?  Here's a summary, he was a maximal, was trying to rescue Nightlight, accidentally got shot in the back, attacked the maximal who shot him, changed his name to Hevn, continued guarding Nightlight/Blackstorm, got the crap kicked out of him in the last battle and stumbled back to the Maximal base.  

Note: He has different colors from when he left so some bots might not recognize him.

::Aerotaur::
       He limps alongside Windlord.  He barely lifts his head up to look at Rattrap.  "Yep, I'm back.  In more or less one piece."  He groans slightly and leans more heavily on Windlord.  "Can we hurry, I need to see her... and then i need a good long nap."


I dont really care if I'm not normal... so long as I'm abnormal within the normal range of abnormality.

---------------------------------
